alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Cochran; Hale; Hockley; Lamb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 1:51PM CDT until June 02 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BAILEY...NORTHEASTERN COCHRAN...NORTHWESTERN HOCKLEY...NORTHWESTERN HALE AND LAMB COUNTIES... At 150 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Pep, or 13 miles northwest of Levelland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Littlefield, Olton, Morton, Earth, Sudan, Amherst, Fieldton, Whitharral, Bula, Pep, Lehman, Whiteface and Springlake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
